sourcesContent:
<template>
	<select v-model="categoryId" class="form-select">
		<option value="">未選択</option>
		<option value="new" v-if="addAble">新規追加</option>
		<!-- :selectedは右辺をv-modelと共通にしないと反映されない -->
		<option v-for="category in categories" :key="category.id"
			:value="category.id" :selected="category.id == categoryId">
			{{ getCategoryName(category.id) }}</option>
	</select>
	
	<!-- <VueMultiselect
		v-model="categoryId"
		:options=categoryOptions()
	>
	</VueMultiselect> -->
</template>

<script>
import * as Utils from '../assets/function/utils.js';

export default {
	name: 'cmp-select-category',
	props: {
		categories: [],
		models: [
			{
				catgoryId: String,
			}
		],
		addAble: Boolean,
	},
	data() {
		return {
			categoryId: "",
			//subcategoryId: "",
		}
	},
	methods: {
		/* 大カテゴリのIDに対応する名称を返す */
		getCategoryName(categoryId) {
			return Utils.getMasterName(this.categories, categoryId);
			//return Utils.getMasterName(this.categoryOptions(), categoryId);
		},
		/* categoryOptions() {
			const categoryOptions = this.categories.map((c) => {
				return {
					label: c.name,
					value: c.id,
				};
			});
			// 先頭に「新規追加」を追加
			if(this.addAble) {
				categoryOptions.unshift({ label: "新規追加", value: "new"});
			}
			// 先頭に「未選択」を追加
			categoryOptions.unshift({ label: "未選択", value: ""});
			return categoryOptions;
		}, */
		/* categoryOptions() {
			var list = this.categories;
			list.unshift({ id: "new", name: "新規追加" },);
			list.unshift({ id: "", name: "未選択" },);
			return list;
		}, */
	},
	/* created() {
		this.categoryId = this.models.categoryId;
	}, */
	/* watch: {
		categoryId(newValue) {
			this.$emit('update:categoryId', newValue);
		},
	}, */
}
</script>

<!-- <style scoped> -->
<style>
</style>
